185593891.review:
Honestamente, esse jogo é muito bom. É inegável que ele foge bastante do padrão de FNaF, algo que o Scott já havia tentado em Sister Location, mas, pessoalmente, eu não ligo muito. A escolha de mecânicas desse jogo é... interessante. Admito que eu gosto da parte Tycoon do jogo e acho a parte das Salvages muito boas no papel, mas não tanto da maneira como foram executadas. No entanto, tenho alguns problemas com a sessão de escritório. 
 Eu gosto da ideia de que cada turno não tem um tempo definido, e que o tempo depende se você vai jogar safe ou vai dar um ALL-IN e rezar, é uma mudança que eu acharia bem-vinda à franquia, se não fosse tão frustrante devido aos teleportes aleatórios que os animatronics podem fazer e à escolha questionável de não adicionar nenhum indicativo de que o animatronic saiu do duto do seu lado. Dependendo da forma que você joga, esse jogo é praticamente uma máquina de apostas. O jogo se torna ainda mais frustrante nas duas últimas noites, com todos os animatronics, em que você vai ter tempo pra fazer duas tasks no máximo antes de ter que counterar os animatronics. 
 De qualquer forma, as sessões de escritório desse jogo não são as piores coisas dessa franquia, e eu agradeço MUITO por elas não sejam assim tão difíceis e por esse jogo não ter uma Custom Night.
 Apesar de todos os seus defeitos, Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator tem o melhor final de todos os jogos da franquia até agora (na minha opinião), sendo o final Completion. Não vou spoilar, mas aquele final é tão épico, bem-escrito e tem um voice acting tão bom, que às vezes eu desejo que aquele fosse o final da franquia FNaF. Apesar de todos os defeitos desse jogo, ele definitivamente merece mais reconhecimento, e é um dos jogos mais subestimados da franquia.

185345729.review:
シリーズ内でも4に並ぶ怖さを個人的には持っており、未だに恐怖心から二日以降をクリアできていない。
それでも尚ファン必見となっている。ファンじゃなくても、ホラーゲームファンならマストプレイ。
無料だし、内容も非常に充実している。
本作は、今までの1~5とは違い、お店経営システムに加え、5夜の難易度調整を可能とした為、ある意味初心者でも気軽にプレイはできると思う。
とは言え、シリーズ内では最強レベル。音を立てながら、耳を澄ますスタンス。
このゲーム性が非常によくできており、プレイヤーの恐怖心を掻き立てる。
怖すぎ。

184945367.review:
"Connection terminated. I am sorry to interrupt you Elizabeth. If you still even remember that name. But I’m afraid you’ve been misinformed. You are not here to receive a gift, nor have you been called here but the individual you assume. Although, you have indeed been called. You have all been called here. Into a labyrinth of sound and smells, misdirection and misfortune. A labyrinth with no exit; a maze with no prize.

You don’t even realize that you are trapped. Your lust for blood has driven you in endless circles, chasing the cries of children and some unseen chamber always seeming so near… yet somehow out of reach. But you will never find them. None of you will. This is where your story ends.

And to you, my brave volunteer, who somehow found this job listing not intended for you. Although there was a way out planned for you, I have a feeling that’s… not what you want. I have a feeling that you are… right where you want to be.  

I am remaining as well. I am nearby. This place will not be remembered, and the memory of everything that started this will finally fade away, as the agony of every tragedy should. And to you monsters trapped in the corridors- be still, and give up your spirits. They don’t belong to you. 

For most of you, I believe there is peace, and perhaps more waiting for you after the smoke clears. Although for one of you, the darkest pit of hell has opened to swallow you whole… so don’t keep the devil waiting, old friend. 

My daughter, if you can hear me, I knew you would return as well. It’s in your nature to protect the innocent. I’m sorry that on that day, the day you were shut out and left to die, no one was there to lift you up into their arms the way you lifted others into yours. And then, what became of you? I should’ve known you wouldn’t be content to disappear. Not my daughter.

I couldn’t save you then, so let me save you now. It is time to rest. For you, and for those you have carried in your arms. This ends for all of us. 

End communication. "

184159643.review: Welcome to Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza, a place for kids and grown-ups alike, where fantasy and fun come to life! Step into a world of excitement and imagination, where the vibrant, state-of-the-art animatronic performers take center stage, delighting audiences with their catchy songs, friendly personalities, and interactive shows. Freddy, Bonnie, Chica, and Foxy are here to ensure every visit is filled with laughter and unforgettable memories. While the animatronics bring the entertainment, our kitchen serves up mouthwatering pizza made from the freshest ingredients, alongside a variety of delicious snacks and treats that will satisfy every craving. From cheesy, piping-hot slices to our signature desserts, there’s something for everyone at Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza. Whether you’re here for a birthday celebration, family outing, or just a fun night out, our welcoming staff is committed to making your visit an extraordinary adventure. So come on in, grab a seat, and let the magic of Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza captivate you! Me personally tho, im a fan of that GYYYYYYAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAT

183965031.review:
Connection terminated. I am sorry to interrupt you Elizabeth. If you still even remember that name. But I’m afraid you’ve been misinformed. You are not here to receive a gift, nor have you been called here but the individual you assume. Although, you have indeed been called. You have all been called here. Into a labyrinth of sound and smells, misdirection and misfortune. A labyrinth with no exit; a maze with no prize.

You don’t even realize that you are trapped. Your lust for blood has driven you in endless circles, chasing the cries of children and some unseen chamber always seeming so near… yet somehow out of reach. But you will never find them. None of you will. This is where your story ends.

And to you, my brave volunteer, who somehow found this job listing not intended for you. Although there was a way out planned for you, I have a feeling that’s… not what you want. I have a feeling that you are… right where you want to be.  

I am remaining as well. I am nearby. This place will not be remembered, and the memory of everything that started this will finally fade away, as the agony of every tragedy should. And to you monsters trapped in the corridors- be still, and give up your spirits. They don’t belong to you.

For most of you, I believe there is peace, and perhaps more waiting for you after the smoke clears. Although for one of you, the darkest pit of hell has opened to swallow you whole… so don’t keep the devil waiting, old friend.

My daughter, if you can hear me, I knew you would return as well. It’s in your nature to protect the innocent. I’m sorry that on that day, the day you were shut out and left to die, no one was there to lift you up into their arms the way you lifted others into yours. And then, what became of you? I should’ve known you wouldn’t be content to disappear. Not my daughter.

I couldn’t save you then, so let me save you now. It is time to rest. For you, and for those you have carried in your arms. This ends for all of us.

End communication.

183917504.review: Двічі обісрався, дві не закінчив всі справи. 9 замін штанів з 10

183904591.review: Somehow lost my Fazballs in the Fazballpit

183796747.review: I often have sexual thoughts of fred bear

183782720.review: As a big FNaF fan from the OG era of games, I believe that this entry has one of the best conclusions to a story in a while. It ties up all the loose ends the previous games established and gives a satisfying end to characters that have been built up for many years. That was until Security Breach came out... Security Breach essentially parodied the OG games in favor of the story it was trying to tell, which didn't end up working in its favor. I understand them wanting to make more games (MORE MONEY!!!) but considering Pizzeria Simulator is such a finality in this story it ruins the impact it has. I still believe FNaF is going in a very strange direction and has lost the identity it once had many years ago. Nevertheless, if you take this game as the conclusion of the series while ignoring everything that came after it's a great sendoff that I highly recommend taking the time to play.

183766413.review:

183714596.review:
This is arguably one of the best fnaf games just because of how charming and funny it is sometimes
In what other official scott approved FNAF game can you snap a small bear childs neck for money?
It's really fun, good lore stuff, nights are kinda spooky even if the jumpscares are just afton_bald.gif, and the salvages are also very spoopy and fun. Not to mention you get to have your own pizzeria!!!!!!!!!
Helpy/10

183651430.review: These inanimate objects do get quirky at nights

183629490.review: this game changed my life and the trailer was peak

183606348.review:
This game needed a lot of work, but Scott has completely abandoned his old series for the greed ridden landscape known as "Modern Day FNAF"
First of all, the night segments feel extremely stressful because its unpredictable whether or not an animatronic will instakill you or not, the reliance on sound is also not as good as it is in FNAF 4 due to all the sounds being really subtle and fitting into the background noise, it also doesn't help that its really quiet.
The salvage segments are near perfect, if only they used the looking down to the paper like in the intro instead of a png of a paper in your face and if the sounds they used before they attacked were just a bit louder

The pizzeria segment is perfect, nothing to say except its perfect

Its not the best in the series but its still pretty okay (also the ending was amazing)

5/10
